thread.title: Take an epic ride in an X-Wing in Sony's new Star Wars: Battlefront holiday trailer - Gaming
thread.title_full: Take an epic ride in an X-Wing in Sony's new Star Wars: Battlefront holiday trailer - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Liam Martin
title: Take an epic ride in an X-Wing in Sony's new Star Wars: Battlefront holiday trailer - Gaming
text: Sony has released its official Holiday 2015 commercial, and it's all about Star Wars: Battlefront.The live-action commercial takes viewers to Hoth and back, and even features a real-life X-Wing.Sony clearly believes PS4 users will be playing plenty of Battlefront this Christmas, and judging by the 9 million people who played the recent beta, they might be right.The Star Wars Battlefront beta began on October 8 and was originally scheduled to end on October 11, but it was extended by a couple more days.It allowed fans to try out three different game modes across three of the planets - Walker Assault on Hoth, Drop Zone on Sullust and Survival Mission on Tatooine.The full game will launch on November 20 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.It was recently revealed that the upcoming first-person adventure will reinvent classic game modes with Hero Hunt, Cargo and the fan-favourite Droid Run.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
